catalog_script_client.name: Populate user form

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_4eb689c21b0f7010b7158559cc4bcb33
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Sign Up">bd4ed8391b4f3010b7158559cc4bcb06</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:6f7e94bd1b4f3010b7158559cc4bcb89</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate user form</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	//get and set user email on change
	
    var user = g_form.getValue('who_is_signing_up');                //get value from form
    // call script include                
    var ga = new GlideAjax('x_58872_needit.sampleUtils');                  //ScriptInclude
    ga.addParam('sysparam_name', 'getUserDetails');                //Method
    ga.addParam('userId', user);                                   //Parameters
    ga.getXMLAnswer(getResponse);                                  //return

    function getResponse(response) {
        var res = JSON.parse(response);
        g_form.setValue('follow_up_email', res.email); //setting values
    }
    
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-08 13:05:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4eb689c21b0f7010b7158559cc4bcb33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate user form</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4eb689c21b0f7010b7158559cc4bcb33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-08 13:45:59</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
